ROW.Title: Rental contract for the vineyards in the island of Sant'Andrea della Certosa
ROW.Synopsis: The document lists some rental contracts for the vineyards located in the island della Certosa. The "casa dell'ortolano" is mentioned for the first time. The text clarifies that rents consist also of vegetable's supply and services, such as washing textiles and giving the ash (cenere) for washing them.
ROW.Trascription: «domus, et habitationis noviter fabricatae per reverendos patres respicientis versus Venetias penes cavanas. [...] Item ultra dictum affictum teneatur conductor ipse prout promisit dare singulo anno ut supra pro honorantiis pepones et mellonos triginta sex bonos, nec non pro quatuor mensibus singulo anno fieri facere lisciam, seu bugatam de drapamentis monasterii absque praemio aliquo, dantibus reverendis locatoribus cinere sufficiente pro dictis bugatis»
